data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernandes, Joana N., Cruz, Teresa, Syoc, Robert Van (2010): Pollicipes caboverdensis sp. nov. (Crustacea: Cirripedia: Scalpelliformes), an intertidal barnacle from the Cape Verde Islands. Zootaxa 2557: 29-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196929
